title: Skin Ideas...
body:
I was thinking about some skins that riot could make but i can't draw for the life of me so i will just list them.... 
1. BattleBoss/Arcade Yorick (Necromancer) 
2.Chinese Dragon Aurelion Sol
3.Underwater Monster Velkoz

What would you guys like to see? I would love to see what you can think up :3
